meanings.sent1: My foremother came to this country many years ago.
meanings.sent2: I learned about my foremother in a history class.
meanings.sent3: My foremother's old recipes are always a hit at family gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The roots of our family tree run deep, with our foremother as the first branch.
meanings.sent5: The portrait of my foremother hangs proudly in our home.

meanings.definition: A woman who originated or was a founder of something.
meanings.sent1: The foremother of modern nursing revolutionized healthcare practices.
meanings.sent2: She is considered the foremother of the women's rights movement.
meanings.sent3: Our foremother of innovation always had the most creative ideas.
meanings.sent4: She stood as a foremother in the field of science, paving the way for future generations.
meanings.sent5: The foremother of the company started it all with her vision and determination.
